typedef void * in

Detailed Description

This is two dimensional square discretization grid.

This class contains methods for insert, get and display values from discretization grid. We can also add Discretization_grid_2D_square object's to each other.

function set_display_thresholds ( in  varargin  ) 

Set display threshold.

Function is overload. Two modes are available: 'thresholds' or 'auto'.

Parameters:
varargin{1} mode - 'auto' or 'threshold'
varargin{2} value of lower threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)
varargin{3} value of upper threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)
